SELECT /* SMDAPsnIfMapper.selectPsnIfList */ PSNIF_SEQ , TITL , CNTN , EXPS_YN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM , #{srchDate} AS 'srchDate' , #{dStrDt} AS 'dStrDt' , #{dEndDt} AS 'dEndDt' FROM SM_PSNIF_MST A
ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT /* SMDAPsnIfMapper.selectPsnIfCnt*/ COUNT(PSNIF_SEQ) FROM SM_PSNIF_MST A

SELECT /* SMDAPsnIfMapper.selectPsnIfDtl */ PSNIF_SEQ , TITL , CNTN , EXPS_YN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM FROM SM_PSNIF_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND PSNIF_SEQ = #{psnifSeq}

when.if: AND REG_DTM > str_to_date(#{dStrDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_DTM < date_add(str_to_date(#{dEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND MOD_DTM > STR_TO_DATE(#{dStrDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND MOD_DTM < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#{dEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)

choose.when: AND ( INSTR(#{q}, A.REG_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )
AND ( INSTR(#{q}, MOD_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )
choose.otherwise: AND ( INSTR(#{q}, TITL) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, REG_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) OR INSTR(#{q}, MOD_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )
